title: Time off work for employment hearings or tribunals

details.description: Employees and workers must be given time off to attend a work hearing or tribunal
details.body:
Employees and workers are entitled to paid leave to attend a work hearing or employment tribunal.

This also applies to:

  • disciplinary or grievance hearings
  • flexible working request hearings
  • retirement hearings

This is in addition to annual holiday leave.

Time off must also be given to someone accompanying a colleague to a hearing or tribunal.
